member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactory4.CreateContentDecryptionModuleFactory
member.summary: Creating an instance of , a class factory for Content Decryption Module (CDM) objects, for a specified key system.
member.param: An LPWSTR identifying the Key System for which the interface is created.
The IID of the IMFContentDecryptionModuleFactory interface to create.
Receives a pointer to the created interface.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactory4
member.summary: Provides the method for creating an instance of , a class factory for Content Decryption Module (CDM) objects, for a specified key system.
